title: Dance in education
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: A program that aims to unify folk dance activities throughout the schools of Victoria by highlighting a series of preparatory exercises, dances by primary school children and more sophisticated dances by ethnic groups.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
